post.text: Join me in St. Louis, Missouri - as I conclude my debate prep.

comment.author: Cassidy
comment.text: .sorry those poor women had to endure the Clinton horror. Do not go easy on hillary tonight

replies.author: Logan
replies.text: And they are being rewarded handsomely. They are doing this for the money. Trump can pay any trained seal to bark.

replies.author: Tristan
replies.text: Liz go back under your rock hun. Unlike Hillary, Tump doesn't have to pay folks to support him. They gladly came forward for this.
